attributes.action: STOP,  child tax credit cut at 2 children as this is causing more child poverty.
attributes.additional_details: To think of the future they want for the generations. Are children are growing up with hungry bellies and clothes too small etc. Not even basic living to be honest
attributes.background: Stop the child tax credit and benefit cuts at 2 children as this is causing the next generation and our children to be in poverty even when we have no choice.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607116
